name: DON'T KILL YOURSELF
description:
You have a cannon strapped on to you in a tight space. Don't kill yourself.

See how long you can survive and how high a score you can get. Getting multiple kills with the same projectile will give double points for each extra kill.

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Pause - Space/Esc

Made in a few weeks for fun.

All art assets made by Will Sagstetter
